Package com.riskgame.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MapController
    This class is entry point of Map management related operation like edit map,create map, load map, validate map etc.
    RiskPlayScreenController
    This a game playing screen controller, where things like Reinforcement, attack and fortification managed and player can play the game through command line also.
    StartupPhaseController
    This class is a controller for the screen which used to choose map, add player, populate countries, place army and command for startup phase.
    WelcomeController
    This is the main file
